data.name: Cultist Simulator: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A compendium of arcane, remastered tracks from the award-winning Cultist Simulator, dripping in atmosphere, lore and something dark and sticky you probably shouldn’t ask about.

Composed by Mickymar Productions, the same ingenious Canadians behind the Fallen London and Sunless Sea OSTs.


1. The Dreams Begin
2. What Now?
3. Apollo and Marsyas: Overture
4. The Ivory and the Lovely
5. The Old Must End
6. Walking the Wood
7. Those Are Pearls That Were Her Eyes
8. The Chamber’s Light
9. We Call Upon the Watchman
10. June the 28th
11. The Shadows Have Spread Like Oil
12. The Worms
13. Gold, Red and Black
14. History Is Less Certain Than We Are Taught
15. The House Without Walls


All tracks will be downloaded to the Cultist Simulator folder in your Steam directory:

...Steam/steamapps/common/CultistSimulator/Cultist Simulator OST

You can listen via Steam’s Music Player, or import the files themselves to any music player of your choice.

data.short_description: Seize forbidden treasures. Summon alien gods. Listen to the soundtrack. A forbidden trove of arcane tracks from award-winning Cultist Simulator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x768 minimum resolution, post-2012 integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later (Steam support is a problem with earlier versions, sorry!)
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x768 minimum resolution, post-2012 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX v9.0c compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x768 minimum resolution, OpenGL Core, post-2012 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
